DOC.brief_summary: This research study evaluate effectiveness acupuncture decrease urinary incontinence ( involuntary urine loss ) woman . The study involve 12 acupuncture session 6 week . We compare effectiveness acupuncture sham ( placebo ) acupuncture ( procedure needle feel like penetrates skin , actually insert body ) frequency volume involuntary ( accidental ) urine loss complete intervention , one month later . Individuals participate study randomly assign receive either actual sham acupuncture . Randomization mean assign chance , similar flipping coin . Study participant know group ( actual sham acupuncture ) assign one month complete 6-weeks treatment . The sham acupuncture needle look similar real acupuncture needle feel like penetrate skin , actually . If individual assign sham acupuncture group , eligible receive actual acupuncture one month complete sham acupuncture want . All individual follow 6 month complete acupuncture treatment .
